allow: Bash(sudo bash -c 'echo ""lldap"" > /var/lib/dokku/services/sso/directory/lldap/PROVIDER && echo ""lldap.web.1"" > /var/lib/dokku/services/sso/directory/lldap/CONTAINER_NAME && touch /var/lib/dokku/services/sso/directory/lldap/LINKS && chown -R dokku:dokku /var/lib/dokku/services/sso/directory/lldap')
